title: Pottermania: As It Happened!
description: The Officially Unofficial late-to-the-party fanbook of the seven-book series.  Ride Side-Along with two Harry Potter superfanatics as we chronicle the landmark events and theories leading up to the publication of the final two novels in J. K. Rowling’s best-selling series about The Boy Who Lived.  Written during the height of Pottermania, Pottermania: As It Happened! offers a unique take on what it was like to be alive during the Decade of Potter––by those who were there.  Journey with us as we assault J. K. Rowling’s complex text, searching out mind-bending clues, and coming to startling conclusions. All in an attempt to scale the Puzzle Palace that was Potter.
author: T.D. McMichael
